articles.description: Dementia is not a single disease; it's an umbrella term that encompasses a wide range of medical conditions, including Alzheimer's disease, similar to heart disease. Abnormal brain changes cause the disorders grouped under the umbrella term dementia.

articles.description: The West Nile Virus is a mosquito-borne, single-stranded RNA virus. According to the WHO, it is “a member of the flavivirus genus and belongs to the Japanese Encephalitis antigenic complex of the family Flaviviridae”.
